metadata.title: CVE-2019-9751 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Open Ticket Request System (OTRS) 6.x before6.0.17 and 7.x before 7.0.5. An attacker who is logged into OTRS as anadmin user may manipulate the URL to cause execution of JavaScript in thecontext of OTRS. This is related to Kernel/Output/Template/Document.pm.

criterions.comment: otrs2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
